branding.welcomeText: Welcome to Tasty Bites! Delicious homemade meals delivered to your doorstep.
branding.tagline: Fresh, tasty, and healthy – homemade meals for every craving!

menu.home: Savor a variety of wholesome and flavorful meals!
menu.products: Explore our dinner menu, freshly cooked just for you!
menu.about: Committed to tasty and hygienic meals. Click to know more about us.

contact.title: Follow Us
contact.description: Stay connected on Facebook, Instagram, and X (Twitter).

contact.title: Address
contact.description: Durganagar, Chandrampalem, Madhurawada, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh - 530041

faq.title: How can I place an order?
faq.description: Select your dishes from the menu and place your order online or via WhatsApp.

faq.title: What payment methods are accepted?
faq.description: We accept UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and cash on delivery.

faq.title: Do you deliver?
faq.description: Yes, delivery is available on orders ₹250 and above (+₹20 delivery charge).

faq.title: What are the delivery timings?
faq.description: Delivery starts from 8:15 PM onwards, pickup from 8:00 PM.

faq.title: Can I customize my order?
faq.description: Yes, you can request customization while placing your order.

slides.contentText: Delicious, hygienic, and freshly cooked meals for your family.
Experience the joy of homemade flavors, delivered to your doorstep.

features.title: Home Delivery
features.description: Get your favorite meals delivered hot and fresh, right to your door.

features.title: Fresh & Hygienic
features.description: All meals prepared with care, using fresh and quality ingredients.

features.title: Quick Support
features.description: Need help? Our team is available to answer your queries anytime.
